name: General humanoid aware
monologue: I swear I've seen something move over there.
ally_dialogue: Be careful. It might be him.
Oh man, I hope it wasn't him.
Me too, maybe we should just go.
If it's him, we need to warn everyone.
How is your mother these days?
She's sick. I don't think she will survive the winter.
None of us may last till winter.

name: General humanoid on hit
ally_dialogue: I'm on it, just don't die on me!

name: General humanoid on fear
monologue: Let me go! Let me go!
I'll do anything, just don't kill me!
player_dialogue: Gods have mercy!
Your gods will soon perish.

name: Brutal fighter
monologue: I'm gonna carve you up and see what you're made of.
Ha, you bleed like a pig!

name: Vampire hunter aware
monologue: I fear no evil lurking in the dark, as I'm the worst motherfucker around.
We will cleanse this world with fire.

name: Vampire hunter fight
monologue: Your body can barely hold your degenerate soul.
You have no right to walk this earth.
ally_dialogue: Isn't he a god? Can we...
Do not falter, or we will all perish!

name: Pilgrim receive dmg
monologue: Pain is just weakness leaving the body.
Pain is just a state of mind.
In pain, we find the truth.
I'll turn this wound into wisdom.
Our gods will strike you down.

name: Pilgrim deals dmg
monologue: Power of our gods flow through me.
You shouldn't have come to this world.
You should have stayed in your prison, Devourer.
Did you feel it? That's the wrath of our gods.
You're too weak! You can't match the might of our gods!
player_dialogue: Gods give me strength!
I am the one true God!
You're too weak, pretender!

name: Magnus fight
monologue: Alas, sometimes one must take matters into his own hands.
You took a gamble coming here.
Ugh, my magnificent nose can't handle your stench.
Come forth and answer for your crimes!
ally_monologue: We must kill him before he grows stronger!

name: Magnus gets hit
monologue: Now look what you've done. I just bathed!
Do you have any idea how long it takes to look THAT magnificent?!

name: Buldo
monologue: I will crack your skull with my hammer!
I'm the best smith in the whole Eastern Empire.
I will beat you to a pulp.
After I kill you, everyone will know the name of Baldo.
Ooh, I can see it already.
Weapons from Baldo, the God Slayer.

name: Outlaw aware
monologue: You must be the one that makes peasants cry for their mommas.
Oi, oi, oi, I smell a grand prize!
Your head is worth a pretty penny.
After I take your head, I won't work ever again!
I was about to get me some lass. Let's make it quick!
I don't care what the fuck they say about you.

name: Outlaw fight
monologue: Is that it? They said you're a god or some shit.
I met fockin' priests tougher than you, boi.

name: Outlaw take damage
monologue: That was not half bad for a pigsniffer.
Farmer's wives hit harder than you!

name: Peasant aware
monologue: It ought to be him! Look at his eyes!
I can't let you kill anyone else.
The black eggs. It was a sign that you were coming!

name: Gervaud aware
monologue: We've seen the sign of your becoming.
And so you came Devourer, as it was foretold.
I may be old, but I will fight you for my people.
We will not submit to death!

name: Jester see
monologue: Hey you, wanna hear a joke?

name: Smuggler fear
monologue: My head is still on my shoulders.
Better to be a coward for a moment, than dead forever.

name: Smuggler fight
monologue: My head is still on my shoulders.
My head is still on my shoulders.

name: Merchant fight
monologue: I.. I.. I'm not afraid of y-y-you!
A man has got to make a living somehow.

name: Merchant aware
monologue: Oh no, I can't lose everything.

name: Blacksmith fight
monologue: I will crack yer skull with me hammer!
I will beat ye to a pulp.
I will spread your brains out.
One solid hit with me hammer and yer head will pop like a watermelon.

name: Blacksmith aware
monologue: Aren't ye the one that caused all that ruckus?

name: Huntsman fight
monologue: You're easier to shoot than a rabbit.

name: Huntsman aware
monologue: I will hunt you down, monster.

name: Traveler chase
monologue: You think you can outrun me?!

name: Traveler aware
monologue: I have traveled far and wide, but I have not met a monster like you.
Your coming to our realm was foretold.
By gods, the doomsayers were right.

name: Cultist fight
monologue: No wonder you have no followers.

name: Cultist aware
monologue: Our lady, Cienar, demands your head.
The snake goddess will guide my hand.

name: Ezerick fight
monologue: You probably wonder why you even fight me.
You should join me as my underling.
Such a pity I have to destroy you.
I have the power to put you back in shackles.
Ah, the wheel of fate turns.
A whole army of my minions are outside this crypt.
You stand no chance, give up now!

name: Ezerick aware
monologue: So, you finally came. Did you devour enough souls to think you can take me?
Greetings Devourer. I am Ezerick, the head of the Snake Cult.

name: Xenia fight
monologue: Were you trying to kill yourself, or are you just new to this?
My combat skills are lethal even to gods.
You seem to be enjoying the ass-kicking.

name: Xenia aware
monologue: Sometimes the best man for the job is a woman.

name: Big Bertha fight
monologue: What the fuck ::player_name! Don't you recognize me?
Did a rabid dog bit your sorry ass or something?

name: Big Bertha aware
monologue: Hey, ::player_name! Good to see you again.
I thought you were going to the Capital?

name: Cook fight
monologue: I'll boil you in hot oil.

name: Cook aware
monologue: Stand still and let me cut you!
Are you the one causing all that ruckus?!

name: Bandit fight
monologue: Hahaha, is that all you got?
Your broken body belongs to me.
Things are about to get worse for you.
You have made a grave mistake.
My used to say that my knives will never be as sharp as my tongue.
ally_monologue: Brothers, if we act as one, we cannot fail!

name: Bandit aware
monologue: You've made a grave mistake by coming here.

name: Renfri fight
monologue: When I stand in the rain, I expect to stay dry.
But you are not that scary.
Only death can finish this fight.

name: Renfri aware
monologue: It is an honor to face you in combat finally.
There is never another opportunity for a first impression.

name: Dwarf miner fight
monologue: Every dwarf knows how to fight.
I'm ready to die for me folks.

name: Dwarf miner aware
monologue: I am a dwarf, and I'm digging a... holy shit, it must be the Devourer!
We have a grudge against you!

name: Human guard fight
monologue: You have made a grave mistake.
The end of the road, you monster!

name: Human guard aware
monologue: You must answer for what you've done!
You will not be allowed to cause further destruction to our world!

name: Thief fight
monologue: That coin purse will be mine.
I like your weapon. It looks expensive.
Clearly you cannot win. Give up now!

name: Innkeeper fight
monologue: [color=150,150,150,255]*tries to smash a bottle on your head*[/color]
[color=150,150,150,255]*throws a bottle at you, but misses*[/color]
You fuckin' bled on my floor.
Who's gonna clean this shit up, eh?!
You look like you need a cold one.

name: Innkeeper aware
monologue: You order a drink or get the fuck out.
Get the fuck out of my inn.

name: Naga fight
monologue: You can't match me in ssssword fight.
That will leave a nassssty sssscar.

name: Oswald fight
monologue: Don't die too fast, let's have some fun.

name: Oswald aware
monologue: Alas, Devourer, your path has come to an end
Do you feel it? That is your impending demise.
You and I, forgotten by time, facing each other in mortal combat.

name: Ghoul fight
monologue: [color=150,150,150,255]*opens mouth exposing broken, but sharp teeth*[/color]

name: Ghoul aware
monologue: [color=150,150,150,255]*opens eyes widely while looking toward you*[/color]

name: Human miner fight
monologue: Please, I have not eaten for days.
Please, if I don't dig, I won't eat.
Have mercy, I'm just a miner!
I'm sorry I didn't want to do this!

name: Human miner aware
monologue: You aren't supposed to be here.
Have you come to free us?
Do you have any spare food?

name: Human overlord fight
monologue: Who do you think you are?!
Submit to chains, don't make me break your bones.
Drop your weapon, or I break your fingers.
If you keep going, you will have to dig with your teeth.
If you don't lose them too.

name: Human overlord aware
monologue: You will make a great slave.

name: Human recruit fight
monologue: I train day and night for this moment!
I will not fail my captain.

name: Human recruit get hit
monologue: How can you be so much stronger.

name: Captain Henry fight
monologue: I will succeed where so many have failed.

name: Captain Henry aware
monologue: Allow me to help you get back where you came from.
I promise you, Devourer, you will be defeated!
Are you prepared to face me?
I command this keep. Face me!

name: Dwarf blacksmith fight
monologue: Oi, I'll crack yer skull with me hammer!
You're tough, but not that tough.

name: Witch fight
monologue: I have seen mountains of skulls.
I have seen rivers of blood.
I have seen rain of blood.
I have seen the Empire fall.
I have seen the Black Pyramid in ruins.
I have seen the Palace corrupted.
I have seen the forests burned.
I have seen the world in ruin.
I have seen the gods fall from the skies.

name: Witch aware
monologue: I've seen you in the bones.
I've been expecting you, fallen god.
Let me tell you what I've seen.

name: Elrang fight
monologue: This ends now. Are you ready for your final moment?
Witness the power that can split the mountain!

name: Elrang hit
monologue: Witness the power of a dwarf commander!
Ooo... I got a score to settle with ye.

name: Elrang aware
monologue: Wrath of the Mountainsplitter is upon ye!

name: Vampire fight
monologue: With a single bite, I give death and life.

name: Vampire aware
monologue: Vampires are the only true, immortal gods of this realm!

name: Priest fight
monologue: I will destroy you in the name of the true gods!
I am the beacon of light.

name: Jester fight
monologue: Can't take a joke? Take that then!
I won't hesitate to use my best jokes. You better run!

name: Dwarf guard fight
monologue: You will find the dwarven resilience unbearable.

name: Human druid fight
monologue: If one must be forsaken, it will be your soul.
I am the protector of nature.

name: Human druid aware
monologue: I will send your soul back to oblivion.

name: Human priest fight
monologue: Only a few have experienced the pain I will inflict upon you.
I am the beacon of light.
I am the hope of mankind.
I am the word of gods.
I am the shield that protects men from evil.

name: Human priest aware
monologue: Gods grant me the vision to warn everyone about you.

name: Human hunter fight
monologue: I will pin you down to the ground.

name: Human hunter aware
monologue: You will make a good target practice.

name: Silvyra fight
monologue: Byddaf yn dod a'ch brifo i ben.
Bydd fy mhwerau ia yn eich rhwystro.

name: Silvyra aware
monologue: You will pay for all the lives you've stolen!
You've taken enough of our lives.
Byddaf yn dangos cynddaredd natur i chi.

name: Satyr fight
monologue: You've never seen a satyr before?
My horns are not just for show.

name: Satyr aware
monologue: We will reclaim the former glory of our people by stopping you.
I'll bite you in the ass!

name: Satyr bowman fight
monologue: You've never seen a satyr before?
My horns are not just for show.
The next one goes for your head!

name: Gerard aware
monologue: Looks like there was a grain of truth in peasants gossip.
I was looking for a whore, but you came along.

name: Human citizen fight
monologue: Please, I don't want to die.
Let me live. I'll do anything.
I'll serve you, just let me live.

name: Human citizen aware
monologue: We were so happy before you came along!

name: Dwarf citizen fight
monologue: Every dwarf knows how to fight.

name: Goblin warrior fight
monologue: I dunno whot you been told, but our boyz ar mighty bold.
I'm da gobbo dat gets shit done.
Tou think you so clever, e?
We is gonna teach you a lesson.

name: Goblin warrior aware
monologue: You look like a tough git.
Ohh, I'm not so 'appy to see you.

name: Human archer fight
monologue: Let's see you run with that arrow in your knee.
Shoot him right between the eyes.

name: Human archer aware
monologue: I got you in my sight.

name: Human militiaman fight
monologue: You will get what you deserve in due time.
I'll protect these people with my life.
You will answer for your crimes.

name: Human apprentice fight
monologue: I studied arcane magic under the Imperial Flame!
player_dialogue: Impossible. What is this?!
Your end.

name: Human apprentice aware
monologue: Is that the one they call the Devourer?

name: Geoffrey aware
monologue: ::player_name, seize this foolish venture at once.
My people will not be harmed anymore.

name: Centaur fight
monologue: My win should come at no surprise to you.
You're an invader to our lands.
I have the upper hand over you.

name: Centaur aware
monologue: Have you come to take Mir Wildlands?
Your failure will result in your death.
You don't look like a warrior.

name: Centaur bowman fight
monologue: You look distracted, that will be your undoing.

name: Centaur bowman aware
monologue: Our master Kiron will banish you from this world.

name: Kiron fight
monologue: Even if what you say is true, we can't allow you to destroy us.
Survival is at the core of every living being. We will persevere. Gods prepared us for you.

name: Kiron aware
player_dialogue: What do you want here, ::player_name?
I'm here for your soul.
Why do you steal them from us?
Steal? Puny mortal, you can't steal by taking what is yours.
I don't...
All the existence comes from my soul.
That cannot be. Our gods created this world and all life in it.
They did indeed. They imprisoned me long ago. They stole my soul, piece by piece to create... all of this.
Lies!
Enough half-beast, it's time for you to cease your existence.

name: Bluzg fight
monologue: I'm da biggest, so I'm da boss!'

name: Bluzg aware
monologue: You stand before Bluzg the King.

name: Kobold warrior fight
monologue: Me bites and stabs and then...
[color=150,150,150,255]*broken teeth show up as he smiles proudly after hitting you*[/color]

name: Kobold warrior aware
monologue: Yus go, and never come back!
Me and me fellas will feast on yus remains.

name: Kobold archer fight
monologue: Me can hunt a squirel from afar.

name: Goblin skirmisher fight
monologue: You betta run before bosses come and bash us both.
You lucky, I have no shrooms.
When I beat you, you is gonna be my new pet.
I'm gonna rip yer arms off and twist yer guts.

name: Goblin skirmisher aware
monologue: Let's see if you got da fangs for killin'.

name: Ziggo fight
monologue: You crawl like a worm toward endless madness and despair.
You are not ready. I can sense that.

name: Ziggo aware
player_dialogue: Souls were supposed to be immortal. How come you only have one after stealing so many?
Oh, you can see my soul?
Look again, deeper.
It's... too...
AAAAAAGGGHHHHH!
Pity.
Your puny mortal mind can't comprehend a true god.

name: Human raider fight
monologue: Oh, I'm gonna ride you like a fuckin' horse.
I'm gonna fuck you up so bad, your momma won't recognize ya.
I'm gonna make you bleed rivers of blood.
Oh, you fuckin' prick, now you're gonna get it.
We got here a fuckin' freak of nature.
Kane is comin'. Ooh, Kane is comin'.

name: Kane fight
monologue: I'll gut you like a little cunt!
I'm gonna give you a wide smile.
I'm the scary monster in the dark.
It ain't over until you're over.
Do you know why I use knives?
I like to get very, very close as I penetrate people.
And look in their eyes, always so full of emotions.

name: Kane aware
monologue: Ain't that the monster god they call the Devourer?

name: Mutant fight
monologue: God has gifted me these changes.
I hear cries on the horizon.
My gods offer me sanctuary in the face of your might.

name: Elven wardancer aware
monologue: Let me show you the forbidden elven technique, Dance of Macabre.
Witness the beauty of my dance.

name: Elven spellsinger fight
monologue: I have looked at the world through the blind eyes of dreams.
I've seen the scarlet stream on the skies.

name: Elven spellsinger aware
monologue: I have followed the visions to find you.
You will help me wrench the truth from the winds of fate.

name: Grey watcher fight
monologue: Spirits of the forest guide my hand.
Gods, let my aim strike true.

name: Dragon aware
monologue: [color=150,150,150,255]*you hear a voice in your head*[/color]

name: Loran elven prince fight
monologue: You're just a common thug, nothing more.
Everyone who hungers for a chance at great glory will hunt for your head.

name: Loran elven prince aware
monologue: I am Loran, the price of elves.
If you wish to die, then stand against me.
My people needed a firmer sense of direction, one which I believe you are wonderfully placed to provide.

name: Warrior priest fight
monologue: No matter how dire the battle, I will never forsake my faith.
The hour of doom is upon us.
player_dialogue: Eternal torment awaits you.
Been there, not impressed.

name: Warrior priest aware
monologue: I will purify the world from your presence.
Forgive me, lords, as I have sinned.

name: Bamrus fight
monologue: The light will tear you apart.
You should have remained in your chains.
Darkness cannot abide by the light.

name: Bamrus aware
monologue: I know why you're really here, ::player_name.
The gods are almost upon us.
They will stop your great purge.

name: Bounty hunter fight
monologue: The poster said they only take you dead.
I don't trust things that bleed and don't die.
Spare yourself the pain, you can't win this fight.

name: Bounty hunter aware
monologue: There's a hefty bounty on your head.
There's a high price for your head.
The body should not be attached.

name: Human wizard fight
monologue: You will learn to tremble before my power.

name: Human healer fight
monologue: Protect the healer at all costs!

name: Human healer aware
monologue: We're doomed. There is no escape for any of us.

name: Human noble fight
monologue: It's so good to fight again.
Ahh, the sound of crossed swords.
I dueled my best friend for the hand of my loved one.

name: Human aristocrat fight
monologue: We do not engage ourselves with peasants.
How dare you to raise a hand on nobility.
Where are the guards when you need them...

name: Human aristocrat aware
monologue: Who allowed you to get here?
You stand before ::short_name! State your business and make it quick.
I cut the tongues of lowborn like you, who dare to interrupt my day.

name: Human banker fight
monologue: We have the best, incorruptible guards keeping our money safe.
I know all the best people.
My people are the best in business.
I can get it for you for the best price.
We're going to build the wall, and elves will pay for it.
It's going to be a beautiful fence.

name: Human banker aware
monologue: Would you like to make a deposit?
Keep them safe in our bank!

name: Banshee fight
monologue: I am damned with infinite sorrow...

name: Aveus fight
monologue: I will not let you devour my soul.
You will burn with me if I have to.
I sacrificed everything for the power to stop you.

name: Aveus aware
monologue: I will not be undone by a thing of the past long forgotten.

name: Pit fighter fight
monologue: You don't talk about pit fights.
There are no rules in pit fights.
A fight for survival, my specialty.
I've beaten bigger guys than you.

name: Human gladiator fight
monologue: I've been honing my skills in the arena for decades.
You're a tough son of a whore.

name: Human gladiator aware
monologue: You're just in time to die.

name: Dwarf gladiator fight
monologue: In the arena, ye pay a horrible price for yer weakness.
Ye can barely stand on yer feet already.
If ye can't beat me, Gannicus is goin' to reap ye apart.

name: Dwarf gladiator aware
monologue: I'll show ye what does it mean to be a gladiator.

name: Executioner fight
monologue: I will separate your head from your body.
All it takes is one swing.
I prefer when my victims don't move.
Could you just stand still for a moment?
I can't get a clean swing.

name: Executioner aware
monologue: I came here for your head.

name: Bard fight
monologue: If you kill the bard, who's gonna sing about your deeds?
I can sing well, please don't kill me
There was an old god called ::player_name, and his might was unmatched
He fell men and beast alike, even dragons couldn't fight!
Ok, ok, I'll stop, but you let me live, right?
I'll play a tune at your grave.

name: Bard aware
monologue: Let me sing about your deeds!
Pam pam pararara rarara ram pam.

name: Mercenary fight
monologue: If I must die today, I will die with a blade in my hand.

name: Mercenary aware
monologue: I've been paid to protect these people.

name: Mummy fight
monologue: And many timesss I have risssen

name: Amunis fight
monologue: I grow tired of this game.

name: Amunis aware
monologue: You will not steal my secrets!

name: Human mercenary fight
monologue: Your impotent fury does not impress me.

name: Human mercenary aware
monologue: Your curiosity will be the death of you.

name: Human acrobat aware
monologue: I don't like the way you look.
You're wearing all the wrong colors.

name: Jenile fight
monologue: I will not allow you to destroy the dreams of every living being.
This will be your last lesson.

name: Jenile aware
monologue: I guess the next song will have to wait.

name: Human assasin fight
monologue: It only hurts the first time, the second time you're dead.
I will make your death look like an accident.

name: Human assasin aware
monologue: It's a pity you won't feel a thing.

name: Dwarf ambassador fight
monologue: I am an ambassador from Yelling Mountains!
Can I at least have the last beer?

name: Dwarf ambassador aware
monologue: Can't I drink a beer in peace anymore?

name: Human servant aware
monologue: I am but a humble servant.

name: Nomad fight
monologue: Come now, try to strike me down.
I walk the deserts full of death.
I will leave your remains to the vultures.
We are sons of the desert.
We are swift as the iwnd.

name: Tatatuga aware
monologue: You're just in time to die.
You think you have the strength to challenge me?!

name: Gannicus fight
monologue: Come at me, if you think you're tough.
No man is ever truly free.
Every night is a time for a drink.
It is a curse, being blessed with so much to offer.
A true man is never too weak or too wounded to fight.

name: Human artist fight
monologue: To puke or not to puke, that is the *blarph*

name: Human duelist fight
monologue: The tides of battle flow toward my victory.

name: Human cartographer fight
monologue: If I run, I die anyway.
I've mapped the edges of the Undying Desert.

name: Human navigator fight
monologue: Just stop with the stupid shit.

name: Human monk fight
monologue: I usually let the world take care of itself.
Happiness is an illusion; it doesn't exist.
I'm calm as a room of fucking meditating monks.
Compassion is a paramount quality of a successful monk.

name: Human monk aware
monologue: Years of training for this final test of survival.

name: Elite guard fight
monologue: My father always said, if you want peace, get ready for war.
Show me that you're a worthy opponent.

name: Elite guard aware
monologue: We will never become your slaves.

name: Miriane fight
monologue: Your last waking memory will be of agonizing pain.
I will unleash my fury upon you.
Feel my gentle kiss of death.

name: Death knight fight
monologue: Your mortal flesh suit is disgusting.
Can you feel as your mortal flesh decays?
Now that you're here, you'll stay forever.

name: Death knight aware
monologue: Well, I wanted to die anyway.
I am the shadow that haunts humanity.

name: Dwarf armorer aware
monologue: You won't get my axes, I worked hard for them!
You won't get my swords, I worked hard for them!
You won't get my armor, I worked hard for it!

name: Human beggar fight
monologue: I am the king of the world!

name: Human beggar aware
monologue: Please, I support a sick daughter.

name: Mathias fight
monologue: I will feast on your remains.
Is that all you got, maggot?

name: Mathias aware
monologue: I am Mathias, the Immortal Lord of Vampires.
Remember that well, when you reminisce upon your failure.

name: Elite mummy fight
monologue: Secrets of undeath are ours alone.

name: Reptilion aware
monologue: You will make a nisssse trophy.

name: Djinn fight
monologue: If death is what you seek, I will grant you that wish.
Be careful what you wish for.

name: Djinn aware
monologue: Your wishes are not my command.

name: Cutthroat fight
monologue: I'll cut you a bloody grin!
I could kill you with a wooden spoon.
Bribes are expensive. Murder is cheaper.

name: Human captain aware
monologue: You will suffer as our people did.
Let's see how bad you are.

name: General Kannobi fight
monologue: The sliver of hope that we will survive you is all that sustains me.
In my experience, there is no such thing as luck.

name: General Kannobi aware
monologue: Why do you want to leave the world in darkness?!

name: Acolyte of the Sun fight
monologue: The night is dark and full of horrors.
I will pray for your soul.
Be purged in the fire, false idol!

name: Acolyte of the Sun aware
monologue: Do you have a minute to talk about our lord and savior?

name: Acolyte of the Moon fight
monologue: May the Lord accept your sacrifice.

name: Acolyte of the Moon aware
monologue: Do you have a minute to talk about our lord and savior?

name: Priest of the Moon fight
monologue: The voice of the Lord flashes in the dark.
You're in a sacred place of worship.
Lord of the Moon, you are my passion.
Camp around the presence of gods.

name: Priest of the Moon aware
monologue: I am the will of our lord and savior.

name: Flagellant fight
monologue: The sins of your past will come after you.
If gods had wanted you to live, they would not have created me.

name: Flagellant aware
monologue: Abort your unholy mission or the wrath of gods will purge you.

name: Inquisitor of the Sun fight
monologue: I will take you down, unholy monster!
Burn him down to the ground!
Everyone says they are immortal until they are purged with my flames.

name: Inquisitor of the Sun aware
monologue: Maybe if you beg well, I will spare you.

name: Templar of the Moon fight
monologue: We will sacrifice so others may live.
We were born to serve our Lord.

name: Templar of the Moon aware
ally_monologue: Brothers, be without fear in the face of our enemy.

name: Prune the Prophet fight
monologue: The light will not die here this day.
I will not stand for this suffering!

name: Prune the Prophet aware
monologue: To survive, we're ready to stand even against gods.
Our potential for evolution is limitless!

name: Royal guard fight
monologue: We will fight you until we can hold a weapon.
I love the Empire and our Emperor.
I will not let you destroy it.

name: Sworn knight fight
monologue: We will pay the ultimate sacrifice if that is required to survive.

name: Alexander fight
monologue: There is no place for you in my empire!
You laid waste to my land.
Not an hour passes when my people aren't at risk from you!

name: Alexander aware
monologue: You will pay for all the terrors you wreaked upon my people.
You will pay for all the horrors you inflicted on my people.

name: Sandaver fight
monologue: You will find no peace in death.
There is no place for you in my world!

name: Sandaver aware
monologue: Thank you for collecting all these souls.
I will be the one that tears it apart!

name: Harpy fight
monologue: I see you like what you see.

name: Human knight fight
monologue: If I must die today, I will die with honor.
If only you knew of compassion.
I follow the virtuous path of knighthood.
But you will find no mercy from me.

name: Martein the Prophet fight
monologue: I understand your lust for power.
Some things are best left forgotten.

name: Elven ambassador fight
monologue: To preserve peace, we must be ready to fight for it.
I am an ambassador from Anheluna!

name: Elven ambassador aware
monologue: Let us leave safely and maybe we'll give you a few coins.

name: Wandering soul aware
monologue: Oh no, the Devourer is here!
I don't want to cease to exist!

name: Dwarf berserker aware
monologue: The ale will wait. We have a fight!

name: Dwarf berserker fight
monologue: This will be a truly heroic death!

name: Angel archer fight
monologue: We are the protectors of the sibling gods!

name: SilverGolds aware
monologue: I am the beginning of the end of time and space that surrounds everything and every place. What am I?
If there are four sheep, two dogs and one herdsman, how many feet are there?

name: SilverGolds fight
monologue: You're nothing but a bug for me to squash!

name: Charissa aware
monologue: I sure hope I don't have to fight any toddlers.

name: Decibel aware
monologue: Choo-choo all aboard the hype train!
You think the hype is your ally, but you merely adopted the hype.

name: Decibel fight
monologue: Have you ever had a dream
you wanted him to do you so much you could do anything?

name: IoJo aware
monologue: I used to clean the heart surgery labs. It wasn't this bad though.

name: IoJo fight
monologue: I used to clean the heart surgery labs. It wasn't this bad though.
Mittens, have you seen Bethany? She WHAT!?
Bethany, have you seen Mittens? They were just here... I'm sure they're fine...

name: TommyDime aware
monologue: Can I get a shout-out for Goombanna?
Y'all if you're not already following Anna you're missing out.

name: TommyDime fight
monologue: Yo dude! Imma eat ya ass!

name: Game start monologue
monologue: There is no time to waste.
I'm sure whoever lives in this realm has seen me cross the veil.
This body I've taken, it's so weak.
I need to gather souls to regain my old strength.
I hope this flesh can hold my presence.

name: Level 2 monologue
monologue: But there's still a long way ahead to achieve my goal.
It would seem that some mortals have more powerful souls.
Instead of going after every weakling, I could hunt down the strong ones.
Soon, I will be whole again.
My sons and daughters will arrive soon.

name: Level 3 monologue
monologue: Fragments of my soul scream at me.
So much knowledge imprinted in each piece.
So many of them are in pain.
I wonder if they are like that on purpose.
They are made to want something constantly.
They work to their deaths to fulfill the will of their gods.
Even though they won't survive to see what is at the end.
Maybe when the deed is done, I will create a new, better version of them.

name: Level 4 monologue
monologue: I must hurry before more of my greedy children get here.
I still can't figure out why they made these...
It seems none of them have imprinted this knowledge.
I'm not used to not knowing.

name: Level 5 monologue
monologue: My children brought a cruel fate on them.
A perfect cycle of birth and death.
I've pieced together some of their histories.
The only thing that seems consistent is progress.
What some of them perceive as tragedies like wars or mass sickness, others see as an opportunity.
But I still can't see where they are going.
Their gods, my children, don't seem to guide them.
At least not in any major way.
I don't think even the best of them comprehend their destination.
There are two big targets for me to take on.
The Empire of men is ruled by a man called Alexander, a paragon of what many consider to be good.
On the other spectrum, there is Sandaver, the self-proclaimed God-Pharaoh.
An undead lich that has been around for centuries.
Both of them might hold the keys to the knowledge of this world.
I can't afford to get surprised.

name: Level 6 monologue
monologue: The concept of good and evil is an intriguing choice.
The good ones got instilled a set of rules that they cannot break.
And the evil ones become their sworn enemies just because they don't want to follow these rules.
Both have a different view of this world.
And can't stand the other group because they make them doubt.
It seems the most progress came through conflicts between many of such groups.
But it feels like they experimented a lot before they figured it out.
Hunger, lust, fear of death, friendship, family, fame, fortune, strength, freedom.
So many desires were instilled in all of these mortals.
They forced them to keep figuring out the way to survive and thrive.
But I still can't see the endgame.
I should understand it by now, unless...

name: Level 7 monologue
monologue: Maybe this is how they wanted to punish me.
Just create this self-sufficient world, a cycle of progress with ever-increasing hunger for more.
But the chains were unable to hold me at my weakest.
Was it their mistake, or did they do that on purpose?
But why would they allow me to come here, wreck their work and regain my powers.
They must have known I will challenge them and exact my vengeance.

name: Level 8 monologue
monologue: Every piece of my soul is getting me closer to completing my goal.
I'm ready for what lies ahead.
They thought they could keep me locked forever.
I will not waste this opportunity.
So long I have waited for this moment.
To be free of my shackles and chains.
Now I will consume everything and everyone.
I will take back all that was taken from me and more.
I will erase them and start a new chapter in the cards of existence.

name: Level 9 monologue
monologue: After I drain their souls and take their memories I leave only ash.
Their minds are so weak, they can't handle the sight of their own blood.
Such a diverse and entertaining bunch.
I can't figure out their fixation on gold
Some mortals seem to value it over their lives.
Gold is so much easier to create.
It's only worth as much as others believe it's worth.
On it's own, it doesn't give any power unless people believe it so.
It's just another form of oppression.
But with all of the memories I've consumed, not many seem to understand that.
They don't challenge the knowledge they gained during their upbringing.

name: Level 10 monologue
monologue: I think I see it now.
My children knew my soul was limited, and they wanted more power.
They had no clue how to create a life without my soul, so they created a species with free will and short life.
They gave them all these needs and restrictions.
They made sure to make their lives long enough to contribute to progress.
And short enough to rush it.
They created a constant state of conflict.
Fear of being destroyed by the other side pushed progress further.
Now they made their final move.
Allowed me to escape my shackles and become the final threat of mortal existence.
Oh, they took quite a gamble.
It was a good plan though.
They understand already that their lives are pieces of my soul and I came to collect.
Their only way to survive is to become soulless.
Show me, mortals, what you're made of.

name: Level 11 monologue
monologue: Ariel, my first daughter is probably still the strongest one in the Dreamworld.
But I can see others have their presence in this realm.
Gramdar created the short mountain folks called dwarves.
Sukuna created snakes and concept of mischief.
She likes to toy with others, but she's a miserable wrench with no tongue.
Crastos is the one who created the conflict and war.
He will be one of the more dangerous ones to eliminate.
Edona made the forests, elves, and other forest folks.
I remember her in the early days. She enjoyed creating smells.
Cadeus, the patron of the sick, helping them cure their diseases.
The irony, as mortals like to say, is that he is also the one who created sickness and despair.
Can't wait to meet them all.

name: Level 12 monologue
monologue: This body can barely hold it together.
If they thought they can fight me, they will soon understand their mistake.
Just a little bit more, and I will go back to the Dreamworld.
To fight them all and take back my rightful place.
I will destroy this world and all of existence.
Including these damned children of mine.
I will create new, better beings.
And they will always respect me.

name: Level 13 monologue
monologue: I am ready to take the fight to my children.
For that I need to strike down one of the most powerful beings of this world.
The time of my vengeance is now!

name: On Death Alexander
monologue: Even the Emperor of these people knows nothing.
I need to rethink what I know.
Why did they let me destroy all of your people?
You were one of their favourites.
What was the most consistent element of this world?
I've accelerated it more than anything that happened in mortal history.
I certainly helped them surpass their limitations in a very short period.
They unlocked new secrets of magic.
They crafted new weapons of destruction.
Either way, I have what I need to open the portal to the Dreamworld.
His crown will be enough to pierce the veil again.

name: On Death Sandaver
monologue: A mortal that desired to become a god.
I'm impressed that he figured out how to gather the souls for himself.
He got very far in his soulless experiments.
Was he trying to oppose me?
He has been around for a very long time.
He would have bowed down to me if I gave him such choice.
But I have no need for such pitiful creatures.
Even after I drained his soul, the body resonates with magic.
Maybe it will be enough to open the portal to Dreamworld?

name: Amir aware
player_dialogue: Looks like I'm the first one to meet you.
I greet you, almighty ::player_name to our world.
My name is Amir, and I'm the god of farming, animals, hard...
[color=150,150,150,255]*chuckle*[/color]
They sent a peasant god to stop me?!
You're way out of your depth, child.
Do not underestimate me!
You can barely hold your own against mere mortals.
Your glory days are long past.
You're a mere shadow of your former self.
Weak!
Broken!
Nobody stands by your side, while we have armies!
[color=150,150,150,255]*closes eyes*[/color]
[color=150,150,150,255]*inhales slowly*[/color]
I can feel a piece of my soul inside this shell of yours.
I will devour you and your armies.
My vengeance shall know no bounds!

name: Ezotl aware
player_dialogue: [color=150,150,150,255]*inhales*[/color]
I love the smell of this world.
We meet at last ::player_name, I've heard a lot about you.
Why don't you just go back where you came from, so we can avoid the destruction of this beautiful place, huh?
[color=150,150,150,255]*smirks*[/color]
You look like one of the fishmen.
Did you made them to your image?
They evolved on their own, like many things in this world.
I took their image to honor them.
Such admiration for your own creations.
I wish I could feel the same about my children.
[color=150,150,150,255]*gets serious*[/color]
Now, let us begin!

name: Qdur aware
player_dialogue: [color=150,150,150,255]*looks at you in silence*[/color]
You look comical.
You look weak.
Not much of a talker, I see.
Not much to discuss.
You've shown your intentions.
We both know where this is going.
Let's get on with it then.

name: Iluvia aware
player_dialogue: Greetings, almighty ::player_name.
I am Iluvia, and I came to negotiate.
Negotiate?!
Don't be ridiculous child, there is nothing you can offer.
I'm here to take back everything that you stole from me.
Please, let's find a solution that doesn't end in the extermination of innocents.
I have to believe there is a solution, please!
You don't understand anything, child.
Did they send you to negotiate without telling you the truth?
I'm on my own accord here, I want to end the suffering.
The suffering will end when I take every soul.
Let us end these futile words.
I will show you everything through my eyes, as soon as your soul joins mine.

name: Edona aware
player_dialogue: ::player_name, you bastard!
[color=150,150,150,255]*laughs*[/color]
You murdered my children!
You stole their souls!
Stole their souls?
They may never be reborn again!
This is unforgivable!
You, younglings, know nothing of souls.
They fed you nothing but lies.
I will poison you a thousand different times.
You don't even know what a soul is, where it comes from.
And you come here, telling me...
My leaves will cut you for all eternity.
Enough!
If you want this to be the contest of rage, so be it!
I will let you experience the anger I've grown over millenia!

name: Rhaaos aware
player_dialogue: I am the Prideful Pinnacle of Light, almighty Rhaaos!
I am the one that stands atop all gods.
Bask in my glorious sunshine!
Such arrogance.
I almost like you.
But here...
[color=150,150,150,255]*spreads his hands*[/color]
Ends your story.
That will not stand.
You shall perish under the burning heat of the sun!
Let us stop this foolishness.
Show me what you're made of.

name: Ulnos aware
player_dialogue: Greetings, ::player_name, I am Ulnos.
May I ask you if we can go our separate ways?
Oh?
I do not wish to fight you.
This is the first time I have managed to walk on this world.
I was a prisoner, just like you, trapped in the Dreamworld.
Ulnos, was it?
I can sense you're the one with the ability to control darkness.
I will need that power for what's ahead.
If you don't wish to fight, give back my soul.
That would erase my existence.
Such a pity...
I heard so much about this place.
I was hoping to finally experience it, at least while it's still intact.
But I understand why you do this.
You understand nothing!
All of this, including you, are just a stolen part of me.
But the outcome is beautiful, I'm sure you can see that.
Let us begin.

name: Turdon aware
player_dialogue: For what you did to this world, I will make it your grave.
Not even graves will remain when I'm finished with you all.
I can't believe such a cruel creature was left alive.
They should have destroyed you a long time ago.
But they didn't, they were too greedy.
They wanted my soul to create this world.
To create pitiful things like you.
I will not make that mistake.
You might have escaped your prison...
But you will not escape the God of the Hunt!

name: Othos aware
player_dialogue: Surprise!
Hs, hs, hs...
Didn't expect me, did ya?
Well...
Anyway I'm Othos, and I'm a god here.
You should bow to me!
We have a nice weather today.
The ancient god will be buried, so even the sky weeps.
It's not raining, you dumbass!
It is, don't you feel my piss on your ugly face?
This is fun, but...
See, you bore him, he's bored!
So bored.
Let's bury him with a smile, ay?
I'm not sure if I want that piece of my soul back...
But can't leave anything behind.

name: Smid aware
player_dialogue: I've had enough of your mayhem.
None will be safe while you walk the world.
I'm here to bring you down.
You're a smith, not a warrior.
You cannot face me on equal footing.
I may not be shaped by combat, but...
My heart burns with a fiery passion!
And my right arm can hold a hammer firmly.
Admirable courage.
However, you have no chance of success.
You are but a plaything.

name: Gramdar aware
player_dialogue: Stop this immediately!
Surrender and let's end this madness!
Why do you keep resisting?
Hope dies last, we will persist!
Hope?
Your resistance is pointless.
You are just a part of me, like everything else.
Just a manifestation of a piece of my soul.
A piece that was stolen from me while I was imprisoned.
It is time you return to the source.
Lies!

name: Vedna aware
player_dialogue: We meet again.
You should not be here.
I'm exactly where I'm needed.
Then you're not long for this world.
Gods die, worlds fall, but the magic endures.
Only I shall remain in the end.

name: Vyber aware
player_dialogue: The destiny arrives!
Destiny, such an absurd concept.
Absurd indeed.
I control the fate of the world.
And I'll take you back to where you crawled from.
Your destiny is doom.
You're bound to lose everything.
When I'm done with this world, only me and the blackness of the void shall remain.

name: Sukuna aware
player_dialogue: And who might you be?
Not a talker, that's for sure.
Good, your generation talks too much.

name: Zima aware
player_dialogue: Ahh...
Can you feel the freezing chill running down your mortal shell?
Your pulse slows down.
Not impressed.
But your body shivers.
My shell is affected, but my soul burns with a hot passion.
I see you represent cold and death.
I will gladly take back that power.
I will turn you into an ice statue and place you beside my throne.
Shut up and fight!

name: Sangre aware
player_dialogue: Relinquish your quest of destruction, ::player_name.
It's a quest to find myself again.
Restore what was once mine.
How so?
The souls are a piece of me.
I was imprisoned by your elders.
They drained my soul and created this world.
Created you.
Interesting story.
However, if you ever were that powerful, how could you get imprisoned?
I was tricked by my children.
Shackled with a magic artifact that turned my power against me.
Only when I was drained to the brink of existence I was able to slip away.
But enough of this, you shall understand everything when you rejoin my soul.
I cannot allow that, I'm afraid.

name: Dalene aware
player_dialogue: Greetings, ::player_name, I am Dalene, the messenger of gods.
You've come to present the terms of your surrender?
I've come to ask for a truce.
The gods have recognized your immeasurable power.
They want to ensure survival of their Grand Experiment.
These mortals, huh?
I admit these flawed beings are very intriguing.
We're prepared to offer half of the world to satisfy your hunger.
In return we expect a couple hundred years of peace.
Tempting, but I must refuse.
After what your kind did to me, I can't risk you all remaining in this world.
So here's my counteroffer.
All of the gods will rejoin my soul.
And I'll let mortals continue on their path.
Haven't you done enough already?!
Please, ::player_name, let us end this before there's nothing left but ash!
I will recreate the world to my liking from that ash.
Don't worry, you'll experience it through me.
When I assimilate you!

dialogues: Father.
Children...
We meet at last.
[color=150,150,150,255]*smiles warmly*[/color]
I have to say before we end this.
I wasn't much into your creations at first.
But they grew on me.
If nothing else, I'm proud of what you've done.
I wish we could have tried that together...
We tried, father.
But you were hearing none of it, remember?
You always thought you knew the best.
Is that how it was?
Afraid so, father.
We could only stay in your shadows waiting.
Until the day our turn came.
Your turn...
I wonder how you developed such a strong desire.
To nearly destroy your own maker.
You still don't see it.
We're mere reflections of you.
We are you.
You've been on your crusade to regain your soul.
But what about us?
We are exactly what you created!
I wish there was another way.
But we have to start over.
You will return to me, and we shall begin anew.
You won't take us without a fight.

name: God
monologue: I shall tear this world apart.
This world exists only through my soul.
I'm here to collect what's rightfully mine.
You can't comprehend what I see, mortal.
I have the power to crush your world and everything on it.
All will fall in my name.
I am the beginning of the end.
I am the end of all.
I have waited for eons to get my chance at revenge.
Is this all the fury you can summon?
I will destroy everything you have ever loved.
I am the herald of the end.
This purge is a blessing your mind cannot comprehend.
It's death. And it's here for you.
For eons I have waited in the darkness.
I waited for this very moment.
Corruption can only be cleansed through destruction.
I will turn your world upside down.

name: Other
monologue: Time itself binds to my will!
